text: Charles-Gilbert Romme (26 March 1750 – 17 June 1795) was a French politician and mathematician who developed the French Republican calendar. He was a President of the National Convention. Category:1750 births Category:1795 deaths Category:French mathematicians Category:Presidents of the National Convention Category:Politicians from Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes Category:People from Puy-de-Dôme
title: Gilbert Romme
